pages.title: Alignment: Fusion
pages.text: <thing>Fusion/$ (light teal) has no 'effect'- but there are several useful block conversions <thing>fusion/$ can do- such as making prismarine from gravel and <item>$(l:essentials:fluid/ingr)pure quartz blocks/$ from sand.$(br2)
<thing>Void-Fusion/$ AKA <thing>Fission/$ also has no 'effect', but can reverse the block conversions from <thing>fusion/$ beams.$(br2)
